Articles.Content:
I was trying to launch a Mun rocket in the demo when the decouplers holding the SRBs failed. Everything but the return capsule and the SRbs themselves exploded.

AND THEN JEB STARTED FREAKING OUT.

You don't believe me?

![i_managed_to_scare_jeb____by_thecloverlord264-d94rb7h.png](http://img05.deviantart.net/f526/i/2015/220/2/9/i_managed_to_scare_jeb____by_thecloverlord264-d94rb7h.png)

I didn't modify the code at all.
No, he forgot to close the fridge's door. Valentina will be furious.

Jeb may be a badS, but when things attached to his craft start to explode, he becomes ... concerned.

Happy landings!
